name: wasm-click-counter
description: proof of concept wasm app with puppeteer integration testing

scripts.build: if not exist dist mkdir dist && emcc src/click_counter.c -o dist/click-counter.js -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s "EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['ccall']" -s LINKABLE=1 -s EXPORT_ALL=1 && copy /Y src\*.html dist

author: ggorlen
